body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\">\n  <entity name=\"cmc_application\">\n    <attribute name=\"cmc_applicationid\" />\n    <attribute name=\"cmc_applicationname\" />\n    <attribute name=\"createdon\" />\n    <order attribute=\"cmc_applicationname\" descending=\"false\" />\n    <filter type=\"and\">\n      <condition attribute=\"cmc_applicationname\" operator=\"like\" value=\"DOMApplication {{globalsessionvalue}}%\" />\n    </filter>\n  </entity>\n</fetch>",
   
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_FallBackUserId@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{gFallbackuser}})",
   "cmc_assigntofield":"ownerid",
   "cmc_name":"AG-Application{{$randomInt}}",
   "statecode": 0,
   "statuscode": 1,
   "cmc_baseentityname": "Application",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})"
}

{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="cmc_application">
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationname" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="cmc_applicationname" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="contact" from="contactid" to="cmc_contactid" link-type="inner" alias="ar">
      <link-entity name="mshied_contact_areaofinterest" from="contactid" to="contactid" visible="false" intersect="true">
        <link-entity name="mshied_areaofinterest" from="mshied_areaofinterestid" to="mshied_areaofinterestid" alias="as">
          <filter type="and">
            <condition attribute="mshied_name" operator="like" value="Dance%" />
          </filter>
        </link-entity>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>",

   "cmc_executionorder":1,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR1-Application-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssigntoUser1}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Application  to User A when Parent contact's 'Area of interest' is 'Dance'

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="cmc_application">
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationname" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="cmc_applicationname" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="cmc_applicationregistration" from="cmc_applicationregistrationid" to="cmc_applicationregistration" link-type="inner" alias="az">
      <link-entity name="cmc_applicationdefinitionversion" from="cmc_applicationdefinitionversionid" to="cmc_applicationdefinitionversionid" link-type="inner" alias="ba">
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="cmc_createlifecycle" operator="eq" value="0" />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":2,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR2-Application-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser2}})",
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Application  to User B when Application's parent 'Application registration' which is linked to Application Def version is having the 'create lifecycle' as 'No'

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="cmc_application">
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationname" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="cmc_applicationname" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="mshied_program" from="mshied_programid" to="cmc_programid" link-type="inner" alias="bc">
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="mshied_name" operator="not-null" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":3,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490001,
   "cmc_name":"AR3-Application-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_TeamtoAssignId@odata.bind": "/teams({{gteamId}})",   
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Application to Team with Application is having program linked

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"true\">\n  <entity name=\"cmc_application\">\n    <attribute name=\"cmc_applicationid\" />\n    <attribute name=\"cmc_applicationname\" />\n    <attribute name=\"createdon\" />\n    <order attribute=\"cmc_applicationname\" descending=\"false\" />\n    <link-entity name=\"cmc_applicationrequirement\" from=\"cmc_applicationid\" to=\"cmc_applicationid\" link-type=\"inner\" alias=\"be\" />\n  </entity>\n</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":4,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR4-Application-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser3}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Application to 'Fall back User' with Application not having any requirements

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="cmc_application">
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationname" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="cmc_submitteddate" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationstatus" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationregistration" />
    <attribute name="cmc_programid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_contactid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_applicationid" />
    <order attribute="cmc_applicationname" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":5,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR5-Application-ExistingQuery-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"cmc_application",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser3}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}
